Class Component

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlienHousing, Depot, Drill, EnergyDepot, Engine, Housing, Pipe, Shield
public abstract class Component extends Object

      rotates the component, changes its Connector and the direction base of the component type
      Parameters:
      nRotationsClockWise -

    • rotateClockwise

      protected void rotateClockwise()
      Rotates the component 90 degrees clockwise by shifting its connectors. Updates the pointing direction accordingly and increments the rotation count.

    • removeOneEnergy

      public void removeOneEnergy() throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      remove one energy from the EnergyDepot
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException

    • addGood

      public void addGood(GoodType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      add the GoodType given to the Depot
      Parameters:
      type - the GoodType to add
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - throws the exception if the Depot is already full or trying to add RED in not a hazrd Depot

    • removeGood

      public void removeGood(GoodType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Parameters:
      type - the GoodType to remove
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the component is not a Depot or the depot does not contain the giver GoodType

    • getStoredGoods

      public List<GoodType> getStoredGoods()
      Returns:
      the list of GoodType contained in the Depot, an empty list if the component is not a Depot

    • addAllowedGuest

      public void addAllowedGuest(GuestType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      add the given GuestType to the allowed guest of the housing
      Parameters:
      type - the GuestType to add
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the component is not a Housing

    • addGuest

      public void addGuest(GuestType guestType) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      add the given GuestType to the Housing
      Parameters:
      guestType - the GuestType to add
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the guestType cannot be added to the housing or the comoponent is not a Housing

    • getColorAlien

      public GuestType getColorAlien() throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Returns:
      the GuestType of the AlienHousing
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the component is not an AlienHousing

    • getGuests

      public List<GuestType> getGuests()
      Returns:
      the list of GuestType hosted in the Housing, an empty list if the component is not a Housing

    • removeGuest

      public void removeGuest() throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      remove a GuestType from the Housing
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if is not a Housing or the Housing is empty

    • getEnginePower

      public int getEnginePower(boolean activated)
      Parameters:
      activated - : boolean expressing if the DoubleEngine has been activated, not important for Engine
      Returns:
      0 if is not a Engine or DoubleEngine, or it is a DoubleEngine but it is not activated, otherwise returns the engine power of the Component

    • getFirePower

      public float getFirePower(boolean actived)
      Parameters:
      actived - : boolean expressing if the DoubleDrill has been activated, not important for Drill
      Returns:
      0 if is not a Drill or DoubleDrill, or it is a DoubleDrill but it is not activated, otherwise returns the fire power of the Component

    • getDirection

      public Direction getDirection()
      valid only on Drill, DoubleDrill, Engine, DoubleEngine
      Returns:
      the direction toward which the Component ponts, null if the Component has no Direction

    • getShieldDirections

      public List<Direction> getShieldDirections()
      Returns:
      a List of Direction of the Shield, an emptyList if is not a Shield

    • getConnector

      public Connector getConnector(Direction dir)
      Parameters:
      dir - : Direction to look for
      Returns:
      : the relative Connector

    • canContainsGood

      public boolean canContainsGood(GoodType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Parameters:
      type - the GoodType to be checked
      Returns:
      whether the given GoodType can be added in the Depot
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the component is not a Depot

    • getHazard

      public boolean getHazard() throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Returns:
      whether the Depot can contain RED GoodType
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if is not a Depot

    • getBig

      public boolean getBig() throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Returns:
      whether the Depot is big, following the rules of the game
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if is not a Depot

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns:
      the id of the component, it refers to the id given to the JSON file

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the component, including its type, connectors (top, bottom, right, left), and position (row and column).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a formatted string describing the component's state

    • reinitializeRotations

      public void reinitializeRotations()
      Resets the component's rotation to its original orientation. Applies the minimal number of clockwise rotations needed to return to the initial state. Ensures the rotation count stays within the [0, 3] range.

    • canAddGuest

      public boolean canAddGuest(GuestType type)
